episodes.title: Exposing a Cult, Liv’s Untold Story and Life Revelations| You won't Belief
episodes.description:
In this episode, we’re exposing a cult and diving deep into Liv’s untold story as she opens up about her shocking past and life revelations. Liv Parsons is back with the raw truth behind her journey, from growing up in a restrictive cult to navigating relationships, personal struggles, and her path to freedom.

Liv’s Life Recap:

Born into a cult, Liv’s early life was anything but ordinary. She shares the challenges she faced, from marriage to a man she met in Hawaii to moving to Japan while he explored infidelity in the U.S.
Immersed in the intense party and drug scene of the restaurant industry, Liv battled personal lows, including an attempt on her own life. A chance encounter with a firefighter brought hope, but ultimately led to her decision to move back to Australia.
Now expecting a baby, Liv shares the twists and turns of her journey: Who’s the father, and how did he take the news? Join us as we uncover the stories Liv has kept hidden, including new revelations about her family’s escape from the cult and the dark truths behind the Geelong Revival Centre. With the recent passing of Head Pastor Noel Hollins, a flood of long-suppressed stories is emerging—revealing abuse, control, and the trauma faced by those trapped inside.

Would You Rather – Dirty Version
Stay in the Gray Podcast brings humor and honesty to the toughest questions, and Liv’s take on it all is unforgettable.

Discussion: Abortion
Trey and Ryan ask Liv her thoughts on the “my body, my choice” movement, men’s role in the discussion, and the ever-present debate around abortion rights.

Liv’s Move to Australia
Liv’s story continues as she prepares to return to Australia, where she’ll begin a new chapter with her two dogs, her baby, and a mission to rebuild her life. With a GoFundMe set up to support her move, Trey and Ryan offer their humorous take on Australia’s “wildlife” and the surprises that await Liv.

Ryan’s Closing Quote: "Oxygen and Negativity."

Don’t miss this episode where we’re exposing a cult, sharing Liv’s untold story, and uncovering life revelations that you won’t believe!

Liv's gofundme : https://gofund.me/28375aad

episodes.title: S3 Episode 23 (#88) - To hear a tale of lust, drugs, addiction, suicide, and love
episodes.description: SPECIAL GUEST: LIV You don’t want to miss this one! Australian woman, Liv, opens up to us about her fascinating life of love and heartbreak, drug addiction, cults, a suicide attempt, and being stuck halfway across the world through much of it. 0:00 – LIV in studio: Biden out and Kamala in / Kimberly Cheadle steps down as head of Secret Service 4:06 – Meet Liv: Cult upbringing, the Elders, rules of courtship, and her first times 15:28 – Adult “Would You Rather…?” with Liv 23:59 – Meeting her first true love on Hawaiian vacation, engaged and living in Japan soon after 36:35 – Drinking and realization hits while stranded in Japan 49:33 – LIV falls in love…with married man: husband returns to try again! BAM…COVID traps them together 56:30 – Divorced and dating in Dallas: drug and alcohol addiction as a server 67:35 – LIV attempts to take her own life 83:20 – LIV sober and dating a LOT now: Announcement 94:48 – Australian animals and creatures: Trey and Ryan are OUT ENJOY this incredible tale! Please subscribe to our YouTube channel! https://www.youtube.com/@stayinthegraypodcast Also, follow us on our host, Spotify! ⁠https://open.spotify.com/show/StayintheGrayPodcast Or listen anywhere podcasts exist!
